name: df-riota
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0
body: |- wceq(crio(s0, c0, w0), cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ iota(s0 ∈ c0, w0)= iota(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
comment: Define restricted description binder. In case there is no unique ` x ` such that ` ( x e. A /\ ph ) ` holds, it evaluates to the empty set. See also comments for ~ df-iota . (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.) (Revised by NM, 2-Sep-2018.)
